3 TaskController::TaskController(const ros::NodeHandle _nh) :
4  nh_(_nh)
5 {
6  task_controller_server_ = nh_.advertiseService("task_controller", &TaskController::taskControllerCallback, this);
7  robot_.reset(new aero::interface::AeroMoveitInterface(nh_));
8 }

10 bool TaskController::initMotion(){
11  robot_->sendLifter(0.0, -0.4, 3000);
12  robot_->waitInterpolation();
13 
14  return true;
15 }

24 bool TaskController::taskControllerCallback(task_editor::TaskController::Request &_req, task_editor::TaskController::Response &_res)
25 {
26  ROS_INFO("call back start");
27 
28  if(_req.task == "init"){ //サービスのタスク名が"init"の時
29  if(initMotion() == true) _res.result = "succeeded";
30  else _res.result = "aborted";
31  }
32  else if(_req.task == "lifter"){ //サービスのタスク名が"lifter"の時
33  if(moveLifter(_req.lifter_position[0],_req.lifter_position[1],_req.lifter_position[2]) == true) _res.result = "succeeded";
34  else _res.result = "aborted";
35  }
36 
37 
38 }
